segments.text: From my view, the angled perspective shows the counter and sink clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel bunched on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden path with bushes looks tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No plug in sight, drain clogged probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's splayed and unstable, tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the stool to look so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not helping with the stool, just waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains unaware of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This setup is unexpectedly full of hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
